prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Enterprise Ready solutions come with built-in features addressing security, privacy, encryption, testing, and scalability. These considerations ensure that the developed applications are production-ready and can meet the demanding requirements of enterprise environments.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
